---
category: news
title: "Recently updated global diabetic retinopathy screening guidelines: commonalities, differences, and future possibilities"
excerpt: "Diabetic retinopathy (DR) is a global health burden. Screening for sight-threatening DR (STDR) is the first cost-effective step to decrease this burden. We analyzed the similarities and variations between the recent country-specific and the International Council of Ophthalmology (ICO) DR guideline to identify gaps and suggest possible solutions for future universal screening."
